hero.title: Salon Privé – Luxury Exhibition Experience
hero.summary: Salon Privé is a luxury exhibit designed by Wise Nadel Design and built in partnership with Kilbarry Hill Construction for the Living Luxe Design Show 2024. The project featured an immersive lounge space with premium materials, a deep-green quartzite focal element, bespoke millwork, and experiential finishing. It won the Outstanding Booth Design award for its cohesive vision and execution.

summary.title: Executive Summary
summary.body: Salon Privé is a luxury exhibit designed by Wise Nadel Design and built in partnership with Kilbarry Hill Construction for the Living Luxe Design Show 2024. The project featured an immersive lounge space with premium materials, a deep-green quartzite focal element, bespoke millwork, and experiential finishing. It won the Outstanding Booth Design award for its cohesive vision and execution.

highlights.title: Project Highlights
items: Award winner: Outstanding Booth Design at Living Luxe Design Show 2024
20×30-ft immersive exhibit built onsite in under three days
Designed to showcase luxury materials, custom millwork, and experiential space
Collaborative execution with Kilbarry Hill Construction and specialty trades

designStrategy.title: Design Strategy
designStrategy.body: Salon Privé was conceived to elevate the idea of residential lounge luxury into a public exhibit. Inspired by natural forms and organic materials, the design used deep-green quartzite, engineered herringbone flooring, brass accents, and bespoke furnishings to create an elegant yet welcoming experience.

execution.title: Execution & Construction
execution.body: The project was concepted over four months and assembled onsite at the Toronto Congress Centre within three days. It required precise coordination of trades, logistical staging of premium materials, and adaptive construction methods.

results.title: Results & Impact
results.body: The exhibit attracted significant attention from visitors and industry peers, received unanimous praise for design cohesion, and was recognized by the jury for its excellence.
